title: The Rev. Calvin O. Butts III, Dynamic Harlem Pastor, Dies at 73
description: He led Abyssinian Baptist Church and helped revitalize his community by building housing, some of which he reserved for existing residents.
dc:creator: Sam Roberts
media:description: The Rev. Calvin O. Butts III, the longtime pastor of Abyssinian Baptist Church, at his office in Harlem in 1999.
